name: Aerial Islands
description: Aerial Islands is a easy going 2D platformer made in Unity. The goal of the game is to help Kirby traverse the floating island landscape to eventually reach the portal that will send him home. On the way to the portal their will be various obstacles such as moving or collapsing platforms and various enemies. Kirby can inhale air quickly allowing for up to 3 mid air jumps before having to land. This equipped with a short ranged melee attack  is all Kirby has at his disposal and must be used carefully if he is to make it home.
